#summary The protocol used by Rouge server.

= Client messages =

Login user, password, protocol version
Return s,f

Room.create name
Return s,f

Room.delete name
Return s,f

Room.join name
Return s,f

Room.leave name
Return s,f

Room.say name message
Return s,f

Room.promote name user
Return s,f

Room.kick name user
Return s,f

User.msg toUser message
Return s,f

File.create key shared(bool)
Return s,f

File.read key (pattern allowed)
Return value, version

File.write key value version
Return s,f

Social.add user
Return s,f

Social.remove user
Return s,f

Social.send message
Return s,f

Social.list
Return collection user

Var.set key value
Return s,f

Var.get key
Return value

Var.sub key (user)
Return s,f
 (eventually add patterns, creates interest management)

Var.unsub key (user)
Return s,f

= Server messages =

Room.recv name message
Room.kicked name
Room.delete name

Msg.recv fromUser message

Server.kicked reason

Social.recv message

Var.update key value
